mapper.select: select * from (select QnA.*,@rownum:=@rownum+1 as r from QnA, (SELECT @rownum:=0) r where writer!='admin' order by qnaNo desc) a where r between #{start} and #{end}
select * from (select QnA.*,@rownum:=@rownum+1 as r from QnA, (SELECT @rownum:=0) r where writer='admin' order by qnaNo desc) a where r between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update QnA set title=#{title},content=#{content},fileName=if(isnull(#{fileName}),fileName,#{fileName}), file_id= if(isnull(#{file_id}),file_id,#{file_id}) where qnaNo=#{qnaNo}
update QnA set hits=hits+1 where qnaNo=#{qnaNo}
